name: Kaleidoscope Media
tagline: Nashville Marketing, Brand Development and PR Firm
description:
Kaleidoscope Media is a full-service PR and marketing firm based in Nashville. The team offers strategy and services in the areas of public relations & publicity, events, and digital marketing. The agency purposefully maintains a balance between entertainment, corporate clients, foundation and not-for-profit work. 
Kaleidoscope Media has worked with hundreds of clients coast to coast — from launching entertainment icons like Kenny Chesney and Tim McGraw.
